---
id: exchange-email-security-code
title: "Email (Exchange)"
description: "Exchange a security code issued from the [Email Request endpoint](/restapi/docs/request-email-security-code) for an access token. To use this functionality you *must* use your games api_key from your games profile on mod.io and the same api_key must be used from the original request for a security code. A Successful request will return an [Access Token Object](/restapi/docs/schemas/access-token-object)."

import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Email (Exchange)"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/oauth/emailexchange"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Exchange a security code issued from the [Email Request endpoint](/restapi/docs/request-email-security-code) for an access token. To use this functionality you *must* use your games api_key from your games profile on mod.io and the same api_key must be used from the original request for a security code. A Successful request will return an [Access Token Object](/restapi/docs/schemas/access-token-object).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/x-www-form-urlencoded":{"schema":{"title":"Email Authentication Security Code Request","required":["email"],"properties":{"security_code":{"description":"","type":"string","example":"P39TM"},"date_expires":{"description":"Unix timestamp of date in which the returned token will expire. Value cannot be higher than the default value which is a common year (unix timestamp + 31536000 seconds). Using a token after it's expiry time has elapsed will result in a `401 Unauthorized` response.","type":"integer"}},"type":"object"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successful Request","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"title":"Access Token Object","description":"Contains user access token.","properties":{"code":{"description":"HTTP Response Code.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":200},"access_token":{"description":"The user's access token.","type":"string","example":"eyJ0eXAiOiXKV1QibCJhbLciOiJeiUzI1....."},"date_expires":{"description":"Unix timestamp of the date this token will expire. Default is one year from issue date. See [Access Token Lifetime & Expiry](/restapi/docs/making-requests).","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":1570673249}},"type":"object"}}}},"401":{"description":"error_auth_failed_different_key","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"title":"Error Object","description":"Standard API error response.","properties":{"error":{"description":"Contains error data.","properties":{"code":{"description":"The [HTTP code](/restapi/introduction#response-codes).","type":"integer","format":"int32","default":403},"error_ref":{"description":"The mod.io error code.","type":"integer","default":10000},"message":{"description":"The server response to your request. Responses will vary depending on the endpoint, but the object structure will persist.","type":"string","default":"You do not have the required permissions to access this resource."},"errors":{"description":"Optional Validation errors object. This field is only supplied if the response is a validation error `422 Unprocessible Entity`. See [errors documentation](/restapi/errors) for more information.","type":"object"}},"type":"object"}},"type":"object"}}},"x-errorrefs":{"11011":"error_auth_failed_code_redeemed","11012":"error_auth_failed_code_expired","11013":"error_auth_failed_different_key","11014":"error_auth_failed_invalid_code"}},"403":{"description":"The user account associated with this email is locked. Please contact support for assistance.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"title":"Error Object","description":"Standard API error response.","properties":{"error":{"description":"Contains error data.","properties":{"code":{"description":"The [HTTP code](/restapi/introduction#response-codes).","type":"integer","format":"int32","default":403},"error_ref":{"description":"The mod.io error code.","type":"integer","default":10000},"message":{"description":"The server response to your request. Responses will vary depending on the endpoint, but the object structure will persist.","type":"string","default":"You do not have the required permissions to access this resource."},"errors":{"description":"Optional Validation errors object. This field is only supplied if the response is a validation error `422 Unprocessible Entity`. See [errors documentation](/restapi/errors) for more information.","type":"object"}},"type":"object"}},"type":"object"}}},"x-errorrefs":{"17053":"The user account associated with this email is locked. Please contact support for assistance."}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
